meanings: (원래 상태로) return (to), be restored (to), go[get] back (to), revert to (=되돌아가다)
(길을 우회해서) make[take] a detour, take a roundabout way
wait and see how the matter develops[things turn out]

vlive.korean: 나 동부에서 24년동안 살았어 , 뭔지도 몰라 ... 이 세상이 어떻게 돌아가는지... I lived in the East for 24 years. I don't know... how this world goes around... 듣기 View video 해요TV (HEYOTV) : [온앤오프] 모두를 놀라게 한 와이엇의 마피아 추리력 @해요TV 180329
vlive.english: I lived in the East for 24 years. I don't know... how this world goes around...

vlive.korean: 나도 어떻게 돌아가는지 모르겠어. -그럽시다. I don't know. - OK. 듣기 View video BTS : [REPLAY] BTS 'WINGS' preview SHOW
저희는 지금 어떻게 돌아가는지 상황을 모르겠어요. We don't know how things are. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 '가을 운동회'
vlive.english: We don't know how things are.

vlive.korean: [오빠들 기다림엔 역시 인터넷 찬스] 한국도 어떻게 돌아가는지 한번 봐야지. [Her chance to use the internet] Let's see what's on the news in Korea. 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [플랜맨_북해도] 짱나게 할래? 짱나!투어 _ 5회
vlive.english: [Her chance to use the internet] Let's see what's on the news in Korea.

vlive.korean: 만약 그때로 돌아갈 수 있다면 돌아가고 싶어? If you can go back then, do you want to go back? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: If you can go back then, do you want to go back?

examples.korean: I’ve no idea how her mind works! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그녀의 사고방식이 도대체 어떻게 돌아가는지 모르겠어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve no idea how her mind works! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She must know the play backwards by now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지금쯤은 그녀가 일이 어떻게 돌아가는지 극히 잘 알 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She must know the play backwards by now. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They couldn’t fire him, he reasoned. He was the only one who knew how the system worked. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그들이 자신을 해고하지는 못할 것이라고 판단했다. 그는 그 시스템이 어떻게 돌아가는지를 아는 유일한 사람이었으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They couldn’t fire him, he reasoned. He was the only one who knew how the system worked. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We need more time to see how things develop before we take action. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 행동을 취하기 전에 일이 어떻게 돌아가는지 지켜 볼 수 있는 시간이 더 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We need more time to see how things develop before we take action. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I am really behind on the news right now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 요즘은 세상이 어떻게 돌아가는지 통 모르겠다 Neungyule
examples.english: I am really behind on the news right now. Add to Wordbook
